trans-unit.source: Namespaces are declared using the namespace keyword. A file containing a namespace must declare the namespace at the top of the file before any other code - with one exception: the declare keyword.

Nested namespaces are not allowed.

Nesting an anonymous class within another class does not give it access to any private or protected methods or properties of that outer class. In order to use the outer class' protected properties or methods, the anonymous class can extend the outer class. To use the private properties of the outer class in the anonymous class, they must be passed through its constructor:
trans-unit.target: 将匿名类嵌套在另一个类中,并不能让它访问外类的任何私有或受保护的方法或属性。为了使用外类的保护属性或方法,匿名类可以扩展外类。要在匿名类中使用外类的私有属性,必须通过它的构造函数传递这些属性。

Never cast an unknown fraction to integer, as this can sometimes lead to unexpected results.

trans-unit.source: Never use the e modifier when working on untrusted input. No automatic escaping will happen (as known from preg_replace()). Not taking care of this will most likely create remote code execution vulnerabilities in your application.
trans-unit.target: 处理不受信任的输入时，切勿使用e修饰符。不会发生自动转义（如preg_replace（）所知）。如果不注意这一点，很可能会在您的应用程序中创建远程代码执行漏洞。

trans-unit.source: No socket resource must be added to any set if you do not intend to check its result after the socket_select() call, and respond appropriately. Any socket resource that is available for writing must be written to, and any socket resource available for reading must be read from.

trans-unit.source: Normalization is a process that involves transforming characters and sequences of characters into a formally-defined underlying representation. This process is most important when text needs to be compared for sorting and searching, but it is also used when storing text to ensure that the text is stored in a consistent representation.
trans-unit.target: 规范化是一个涉及将字符和字符序列转化为正式定义的基本表示的过程。当需要对文本进行排序和搜索比较时,这一过程最为重要,但在存储文本时也会使用这一过程,以确保文本以一致的表示方式存储。

trans-unit.source: Normally PHP would search the current directory for file2.txt, which would translate as the directory of file.php, or the current directory of a command-line user. Phar::interceptFileFuncs() instructs PHP to consider the current directory to be phar:///path/to/myphar.phar/ and so opens phar:///path/to/myphar.phar/file2.txt in the above example code.
trans-unit.target: 通常，PHP会在当前目录中搜索file2.txt，这将转换为file.php的目录或命令行用户的当前目录。Phar :: interceptFileFuncs（）指示PHP将当前目录视为phar：///path/to/myphar.phar/，因此在上面打开phar：///path/to/myphar.phar/file2.txt示例代码。

trans-unit.source: Normally, the search starts from the beginning of the subject string. The optional parameter offset can be used to specify the alternate place from which to start the search (in bytes).
trans-unit.target: 通常，搜索从主题字符串的开头开始。可选参数 offset 可用于指定开始搜索的替代位置（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Normally, this integer value is zero or one. A zero or one tells Quantize to choose a optimal tree depth of Log4(number_colors).% A tree of this depth generally allows the best representation of the reference image with the least amount of memory and the fastest computational speed. In some cases, such as an image with low color dispersion (a few number of colors), a value other than Log4(number_colors) is required. To expand the color tree completely, use a value of 8.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下,这个整数值是0或1,0或1告诉Quantize选择最佳树的深度为Log4(number_colors).%。0或1告诉Quantize选择一个最佳的树深度,即Log4(number_colors).%,这个深度的树通常可以用最少的内存和最快的计算速度来表示参考图像。在某些情况下,例如颜色分散度较低的图像(颜色数量较少),则需要使用 Log4(number_colors)以外的值。要完全展开颜色树,请使用8的值。

trans-unit.source: Not all conversion specifiers may be supported by your C library, in which case they will not be supported by PHP's strftime(). Additionally, not all platforms support negative timestamps, so your date range may be limited to no earlier than the Unix epoch. This means that %e, %T, %R and, %D (and possibly others) - as well as dates prior to Jan 1, 1970 - will not work on Windows, some Linux distributions, and a few other operating systems. For Windows systems, a complete overview of supported conversion specifiers can be found at » MSDN.
trans-unit.target: 您的C库可能不支持所有转换说明符，在这种情况下，PHP的strftime（）将不支持它们。此外，并非所有平台都支持负时间戳，因此您的日期范围不得超过Unix时代。这意味着％e，％T，％R和％D（以及其他可能）以及1970年1月1日之前的日期将无法在Windows，某些Linux发行版和其他一些操作系统上运行。对于Windows系统，可以在» MSDN中找到受支持的转换说明符的完整概述。

trans-unit.source: Note that password_hash() returns the algorithm, cost and salt as part of the returned hash. Therefore, all information that's needed to verify the hash is included in it. trans-unit.source: Note that fread() reads from the current position of the file pointer. Use ftell() to find the current position of the pointer and rewind() to rewind the pointer position.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，fread（）从文件指针的当前位置读取。使用ftell（）查找指针的当前位置，并使用rewind（）倒带指针位置。

trans-unit.source: Note that mysqli_fetch_object() sets the properties of the object before calling the object constructor.
trans-unit.target: 注意，mysqli_fetch_object（）在调用对象构造函数之前设置对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: Note that preg_quote() is not meant to be applied to the $replacement string(s) of preg_replace() etc.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，preg_quote（）并不打算应用于preg_replace（）等的$ replacement字符串。

trans-unit.source: Note that MySQL Native Driver does not support SSL before PHP 5.3.3, so calling this function when using MySQL Native Driver will result in an error. MySQL Native Driver is enabled by default on Microsoft Windows from PHP version 5.3 onwards.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,在PHP 5.3.3之前,MySQL Native Driver不支持SSL,所以在使用MySQL Native Driver时调用这个函数会导致错误。从PHP 5.3版本开始,MySQL Native Driver在Microsoft Windows上是默认启用的。

trans-unit.source: Note that PHP does not expose whether --enable-zend-multibyte was used to compile PHP other than by phpinfo().
trans-unit.target: 请注意，除了phpinfo（）以外，PHP不会公开是否使用--enable-zend-multibyte来编译PHP 。

trans-unit.source: Note that PHP internally stores integer values as signed values of a machine-dependent size (C type long). Integer literals and operations that yield numbers outside the bounds of the integer type will be stored as float. When packing these floats as integers, they are first cast into the integer type. This may or may not result in the desired byte pattern.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，PHP在内部将整数值存储为与机器相关的大小（C类型long）的有符号值。产生超出整数类型范围的数字的整数文字和运算将存储为float。将这些浮点数打包为整数时，首先将它们转换为整数类型。这可能会或可能不会导致所需的字节模式。

trans-unit.source: Note that PHP internally stores integral values as signed. If you unpack a large unsigned long and it is of the same size as PHP internally stored values the result will be a negative number even though unsigned unpacking was specified.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,PHP内部存储的积分值是有符号的,如果解包一个大的无符号长,并且它的大小与PHP内部存储的值相同,那么即使指定了无符号解包,结果也会是负数。如果解包一个大的无符号长值,并且它的大小与PHP内部存储的值相同,那么即使指定了无符号解包,结果也会是一个负数。

trans-unit.source: Note that Unicode just recommends to ignore Cf (format controls).
trans-unit.target: 注意,Unicode只是建议忽略Cf(格式控制)。

trans-unit.source: Note that a cookie will replace a previous cookie by the same name in your browser unless the path or domain is different. So, for a shopping cart application you may want to keep a counter and pass this along. i.e.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,在您的浏览器中,除非路径或域名不同,否则一个cookie将取代之前的同名cookie。因此,对于购物车应用程序,您可能希望保留一个计数器,并将其传递给您。

trans-unit.source: Note that a variable may be evaluated with different values in certain situations, depending on what type it is at the time. For more information, see the section on Type Juggling. The type comparison tables may also be useful, as they show examples of various type-related comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在某些情况下，变量可能会使用不同的值进行评估，具体取决于当时的类型。有关更多信息，请参见Type Juggling一节。类型比较表也可能有用，因为它们显示了各种类型相关比较的示例。

trans-unit.source: Note that all columns must be bound after mysqli_stmt_execute() and prior to calling mysqli_stmt_fetch(). Depending on column types bound variables can silently change to the corresponding PHP type.
trans-unit.target: 注意，所有列必须在mysqli_stmt_execute（）之后和调用mysqli_stmt_fetch（）之前绑定。根据列类型，绑定变量可以静默更改为相应的PHP类型。

trans-unit.source: Note that all columns must be bound by the application before calling mysqli_stmt_fetch().
trans-unit.target: 注意，在调用mysqli_stmt_fetch（）之前，所有列都必须由应用程序绑定。

trans-unit.source: Note that all executable phar archives have a signature created automatically, SHA1 by default. data tar- or zip-based archives (archives created with the PharData class) must have their signature created and set explicitly via Phar::setSignatureAlgorithm().
trans-unit.target: 请注意，所有可执行的phar存档均具有自动创建的签名，默认情况下为SHA1。基于数据tar或zip的档案（使用PharData类创建的档案）必须创建其签名并通过Phar :: setSignatureAlgorithm（）进行显式设置。

trans-unit.source: Note that class constants are allocated once per class, and not for each class instance.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,每个类常量只分配一次,而不是为每个类实例分配。

trans-unit.source: Note that depending on what extensions you have compiled or loaded into PHP, additional classes could be present. trans-unit.source: Note that for namespaced names (fully qualified namespace names containing namespace separator, such as Foo\Bar as opposed to global names that do not, such as FooBar), the leading backslash is unnecessary and not recommended, as import names must be fully qualified, and are not processed relative to the current namespace.

trans-unit.source: Note that if 'Content-Type: text/*' is sent, the content body is regarded as text; conversion will take place.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,如果发送 "Content-Type:text/*",内容主体将被视为文本,并进行转换。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the length argument is given, then the magic_quotes_runtime configuration option will be ignored and no slashes will be stripped from string.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果给出了 length 参数，那么magic_quotes_runtime配置选项将被忽略，并且 string 中不会去除任何斜杠。

trans-unit.source: Note that index '3' is defined twice, and keep its final value of 13. Index 4 is defined after index 8, and next generated index (value 19) is 9, since biggest index was 8.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,索引'3'被定义了两次,并保持其最终值为13。 索引4被定义在索引8之后,下一个生成的索引(值19)是9,因为最大的索引是8。

trans-unit.source: Note that it is possible to declare a constructor in an interface, what can be useful in some contexts, e.g. for use by factories.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，可以在接口中声明构造函数，这在某些情况下（例如供工厂使用）很有用。

trans-unit.source: Note that keys are preserved. If multiple elements compare equal under the given sort_flags, then the key and value of the first equal element will be retained.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，密钥被保留。如果多个元素在给定的 sort_flags 下比较均等，则将保留第一个均等元素的键和值。

trans-unit.source: Note that many built-in PHP objects cannot be serialized. However, those with this ability either implement the Serializable interface or the magic __sleep() and __wakeup() methods. If an internal class does not fulfill any of those requirements, it cannot reliably be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，许多内置的PHP对象无法序列化。但是，具有此功能的用户要么实现Serializable接口，要么实现神奇的__sleep（）和__wakeup（）方法。如果内部类不满足任何这些要求，则不能可靠地对其进行序列化。

trans-unit.source: Note that non-character code points (e.g., U+FDD0) are not "defined" (they are Cn), but surrogate code points are "defined" (Cs).
trans-unit.target: 注意,非字符码点(如U+FDD0)不是 "定义 "的(它们是Cn),但代用码点是 "定义 "的(Cs)。

trans-unit.source: Note that not all MySQL errors are yet mapped to SQLSTATE's. The value HY000 (general error) is used for unmapped errors.
trans-unit.target: 注意，并非所有MySQL错误都已映射到SQLSTATE。值HY000（一般错误）用于未映射的错误。

trans-unit.source: Note that numeric keys in input are not preserved.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， input 中的数字键不会保留。

trans-unit.source: Note that octal values of 100 or greater must not be introduced by a leading zero, because no more than three octal digits are ever read.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,100或更大的八进制值不能用前导零引入,因为读取的八进制数永远不会超过三位。

trans-unit.source: Note that only the first call to strtok uses the string argument. Every subsequent call to strtok only needs the token to use, as it keeps track of where it is in the current string. To start over, or to tokenize a new string you simply call strtok with the string argument again to initialize it. Note that you may put multiple tokens in the token parameter. The string will be tokenized when any one of the characters in the argument is found.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,只有第一次调用 strtok 时才会使用字符串参数。之后对 strtok 的每次调用都只需要使用 token,因为它一直在跟踪当前字符串中的位置。如果要重新开始,或者要标记一个新的字符串,你只需再次调用strtok的字符串参数来初始化它。注意,你可以在 token 参数中放入多个 token。当参数中的任何一个字符被找到时,字符串就会被标记化。

trans-unit.source: Note that pre-release versions, such as 5.3.0-dev, are considered lower than their final release counterparts (like 5.3.0).
trans-unit.target: 请注意,预发布的版本,如5.3.0-dev,被认为比最终发布的版本(如5.3.0)低。

trans-unit.source: Notes

Notice how the XML document shown in the example sets a namespace with a prefix of chap. Imagine that this document (or another one like it) may have used a prefix of c in the past for the same namespace. Since it has changed, the XPath query will no longer return the proper results and the query will require modification. Using registerXPathNamespace avoids future modification of the query even if the provider changes the namespace prefix.
trans-unit.target: 注意示例中显示的XML文档如何设置带有chap前缀的名称空间。想象一下，该文档（或另一个类似的文档）过去可能为相同的名称空间使用了前缀c。由于它已更改，因此XPath查询将不再返回正确的结果，并且该查询将需要修改。即使提供程序更改了名称空间前缀，使用registerXPathNamespace也会避免将来对查询进行修改。

Nowdoc and Heredoc support was added in PHP 5.3.0.

trans-unit.source: Nowdoc support was added in PHP 5.3.0.
trans-unit.target: 在 PHP 5.3.0 中增加了对 Nowdoc 的支持。

trans-unit.source: Nowdocs are to single-quoted strings what heredocs are to double-quoted strings. A nowdoc is specified similarly to a heredoc, but no parsing is done inside a nowdoc. The construct is ideal for embedding PHP code or other large blocks of text without the need for escaping. It shares some features in common with the SGML <![CDATA[ ]]> construct, in that it declares a block of text which is not for parsing.
trans-unit.target: Nowdocs是单引号字符串，heredocs是双引号字符串。nowdoc的指定方式与Heredoc相似，但是在nowdoc 内部未进行任何解析。该结构非常适合嵌入PHP代码或其他大型文本块，而无需进行转义。它与SGML <！[CDATA []]>构造共享一些共同的功能，因为它声明了一个不用于解析的文本块。

trans-unit.source: Of course, values in PHP don't have to be integers, and very often they aren't. PHP supports four scalar value types: integer values, floating point values (float), string values and boolean values (scalar values are values that you can't 'break' into smaller pieces, unlike arrays, for instance). PHP also supports two composite (non-scalar) types: arrays and objects. Each of these value types can be assigned into variables or returned from functions.
trans-unit.target: 当然，PHP中的值不必一定是整数，而且通常不是。PHP支持四种标量值类型：整数值，浮点值（float），字符串值和布尔值（标量值是您不能“分解”成较小块的值，例如，不同于数组）。PHP还支持两种复合（非标量）类型：数组和对象。这些值类型中的每一个都可以分配给变量或从函数返回。

trans-unit.source: On failure the errno and errstr arguments will be populated with the actual system level error that occurred in the system-level connect() call. trans-unit.source: Once-only subpatterns
Once-only subpatterns →

Once-only subpatterns are not capturing subpatterns. Simple cases such as the above example can be thought of as a maximizing repeat that must swallow everything it can. So, while both \d+ and \d+? are prepared to adjust the number of digits they match in order to make the rest of the pattern match, (?>\d+) can only match an entire sequence of digits.
trans-unit.target: 仅一次子模式不会捕获子模式。可以将诸如上述示例之类的简单情况视为最大程度的重复，它必须吞噬一切。那么，同时\ d +和\ d +吗？准备调整它们匹配的位数以使其余模式匹配，（？> \ d +）只能匹配整个数字序列。

trans-unit.source: Once-only subpatterns can be used in conjunction with lookbehind assertions to specify efficient matching at the end of the subject string. Consider a simple pattern such as abcd$ when applied to a long string which does not match. Because matching proceeds from left to right, PCRE will look for each "a" in the subject and then see if what follows matches the rest of the pattern. If the pattern is specified as ^.*abcd$ then the initial .* matches the entire string at first, but when this fails (because there is no following "a"), it backtracks to match all but the last character, then all but the last two characters, and so on. Once again the search for "a" covers the entire string, from right to left, so we are no better off. However, if the pattern is written as ^(?>.*)(?<=abcd) then there can be no backtracking for the .* item; it can match only the entire string. The subsequent lookbehind assertion does a single test on the last four characters. If it fails, the match fails immediately. For long strings, this approach makes a significant difference to the processing time.
trans-unit.target: 仅一次子模式可以与后向断言结合使用，以在主题字符串的末尾指定有效的匹配。考虑将简单模式（例如abcd $）应用于不匹配的长字符串时。因为匹配是从左到右进行的，所以PCRE将在主题中查找每个“ a”，然后查看后面的内容是否与模式的其余部分匹配。如果将模式指定为^。* abcd $，则首字母。*首先匹配整个字符串，但是如果失败（因为后面没有“ a”），它将回溯以匹配除最后一个字符之外的所有字符，然后匹配所有但是最后两个字符，依此类推。再次搜索“ a”将覆盖从右到左的整个字符串，因此我们再好不过了。但是，如果将模式写为^（？>。*）（？<= abcd），那么。*项将没有回溯；它只能匹配整个字符串。随后的后置断言对最后四个字符进行单个测试。如果失败，则匹配立即失败。对于长字符串，此方法会大大缩短处理时间。

trans-unit.source: One last thing worth mentioning is the truth value of expressions. In many events, mainly in conditional execution and loops, you're not interested in the specific value of the expression, but only care about whether it means TRUE or FALSE. The constants TRUE and FALSE (case-insensitive) are the two possible boolean values. When necessary, an expression is automatically converted to boolean. See the section about type-casting for details about how.
trans-unit.target: 值得一提的最后一件事是表达式的真实性。在许多事件中，主要是在条件执行和循环中，您对表达式的特定值不感兴趣，而仅在意它是 TRUE 还是 FALSE 。常量 TRUE 和 FALSE （不区分大小写）是两个可能的布尔值。必要时，表达式会自动转换为布尔值。有关如何操作的详细信息，请参见有关类型转换的部分。

trans-unit.source: Open non-persistent MySQL connections and result sets are automatically destroyed when a PHP script finishes its execution. So, while explicitly closing open connections and freeing result sets is optional, doing so is recommended. This will immediately return resources to PHP and MySQL, which can improve performance. For related information, see freeing resources
trans-unit.target: PHP脚本完成执行后，打开的非持久MySQL连接和结果集将自动销毁。因此，尽管显式关闭打开的连接和释放结果集是可选的，但建议这样做。这将立即将资源返回给PHP和MySQL，从而可以提高性能。有关相关信息，请参见释放资源。

Open the file for reading and writing; otherwise it has the same behavior as 'c'.

trans-unit.source: Open the file for writing only. If the file does not exist, it is created. If it exists, it is neither truncated (as opposed to 'w'), nor the call to this function fails (as is the case with 'x'). The file pointer is positioned on the beginning of the file. This may be useful if it's desired to get an advisory lock (see flock()) before attempting to modify the file, as using 'w' could truncate the file before the lock was obtained (if truncation is desired, ftruncate() can be used after the lock is requested).
trans-unit.target: 打开该文件仅用于写入。如果该文件不存在，则会创建它。如果存在，则不会被截断（与'w'相对），也不会对该函数的调用失败（与'x'的情况相同）。文件指针位于文件的开头。如果希望在尝试修改文件之前先获得咨询性的锁（请参阅flock（）），这可能会很有用，因为使用'w'可以在获得锁之前截断文件（如果需要截断，可以将ftruncate（）设为在请求锁定后使用）。

trans-unit.source: Operator Precedence
Operator Precedence →

Operator precedence and associativity only determine how expressions are grouped, they do not specify an order of evaluation. PHP does not (in the general case) specify in which order an expression is evaluated and code that assumes a specific order of evaluation should be avoided, because the behavior can change between versions of PHP or depending on the surrounding code.
trans-unit.target: 操作符优先性和关联性只决定了表达式的分组方式,它们并没有指定计算的顺序。PHP并没有(在一般情况下)指定一个表达式的执行顺序,应该避免使用假定有特定执行顺序的代码,因为在不同的PHP版本之间或根据周围的代码,其行为可能会发生变化。

trans-unit.source: Operators
Operators →

Operators can be grouped according to the number of values they take. Unary operators take only one value, for example ! (the logical not operator) or ++ (the increment operator). Binary operators take two values, such as the familiar arithmetical operators+ (plus) and - (minus), and the majority of PHP operators fall into this category. Finally, there is a single ternary operator, ? :, which takes three values; this is usually referred to simply as "the ternary operator" (although it could perhaps more properly be called the conditional operator).
trans-unit.target: 可以根据运算符的取值数量对运算符进行分组。例如，一元运算符仅取一个值！（逻辑非运算符）或++（增量运算符）。二进制运算符采用两个值，例如熟悉的算术运算符+（加号）和-（减号），大多数PHP运算符都属于此类。最后，只有一个三元运算符，？ ：，它具有三个值；通常将其简称为“三元运算符”（尽管可能更恰当地称为条件运算符）。

trans-unit.source: Operators of equal precedence that are non-associative cannot be used next to each other, for example 1 < 2 > 1 is illegal in PHP. The expression 1 <= 1 == 1 on the other hand is legal, because the == operator has lesser precedence than the <= operator.
trans-unit.target: 不能彼此相邻使用优先级相同的非关联运算符，例如1 <2> 1在PHP中是非法的。另一方面，表达式1 <= 1 == 1是合法的，因为==运算符的优先级比<=运算符小。

Other values:

Others use the current locale (see setlocale()), but operate byte-by-byte. This is the case of strcasecmp(), strtoupper() and ucfirst(). This means they can be used only with single-byte encodings, as long as the encoding is matched by the locale. For instance strtoupper("á") may return "Á" if the locale is correctly set and á is encoded with a single byte. If it is encoded in UTF-8, the correct result will not be returned and the resulting string may or may not be returned corrupted, depending on the current locale.
trans-unit.target: 其他人使用当前语言环境（请参阅setlocale（）），但逐字节操作。这是strcasecmp（），strtoupper（）和ucfirst（）的情况。这意味着它们只能与单字节编码一起使用，只要该编码与语言环境匹配即可。例如，如果正确设置了语言环境并且á用单个字节编码，则strtoupper（“á”）可能返回“Á”。如果使用UTF-8编码，则将不会返回正确的结果，并且返回的字符串可能会（也可能不会）返回损坏，这取决于当前的语言环境。

Output buffers are stackable, that is, you may call ob_start() while another ob_start() is active. Just make sure that you call ob_end_flush() the appropriate number of times. If multiple output callback functions are active, output is being filtered sequentially through each of them in nesting order.

trans-unit.source: Outside a character class, a backslash followed by a digit greater than 0 (and possibly further digits) is a back reference to a capturing subpattern earlier (i.e. to its left) in the pattern, provided there have been that many previous capturing left parentheses.
trans-unit.target: 在一个字符类外,一个反斜杠后面跟着一个大于0的数字(可能还有更多的数字)是对模式中较早(即在其左边)的一个捕获子模式的回溯引用,前提是之前有那么多的捕获左括号。

trans-unit.source: Outside a character class, a dot in the pattern matches any one character in the subject, including a non-printing character, but not (by default) newline. If the PCRE_DOTALL option is set, then dots match newlines as well. The handling of dot is entirely independent of the handling of circumflex and dollar, the only relationship being that they both involve newline characters. Dot has no special meaning in a character class.
trans-unit.target: 在字符类之外，模式中的点与主题中的任何一个字符匹配，包括非打印字符，但（默认情况下）不与换行符匹配。如果设置了PCRE_DOTALL选项，则点也匹配换行符。点的处理完全独立于抑扬符和美元的处理，唯一的关系是它们都包含换行符。点在字符类中没有特殊含义。

trans-unit.source: Outside a character class, in the default matching mode, the circumflex character (^) is an assertion which is true only if the current matching point is at the start of the subject string. Inside a character class, circumflex (^) has an entirely different meaning (see below).
trans-unit.target: 在字符类之外，在默认的匹配模式下，抑扬符（^）是一个断言，仅当当前匹配点位于主题字符串的开头时才为真。在字符类内部，抑扬号（^）具有完全不同的含义（请参见下文）。

trans-unit.source: PCNTL →
PCRE Patterns
PCRE Reference

PCRE does not allow repeat quantifiers on lookahead assertions. Perl permits them, but they do not mean what you might think. For example, (?!a){3} does not assert that the next three characters are not "a". It just asserts that the next character is not "a" three times.
trans-unit.target: PCRE 不允许在 lookahead 断言上使用重复量化符。Perl 允许它们,但它们并不像你想象的那样。例如,(?!a){3}并没有断言接下来的三个字符不是 "a"。它只是断言下一个字符三次都不是 "a"。

trans-unit.source: PCRE provides some extensions to the Perl regular expression facilities:
trans-unit.target: PCRE提供了一些Perl正则表达式设施的扩展。

trans-unit.source: PDO →
PDO (class)
PDO Drivers →

PDO will emulate prepared statements/bound parameters for drivers that do not natively support them, and can also rewrite named or question mark style parameter markers to something more appropriate, if the driver supports one style but not the other.
trans-unit.target: PDO将为不支持它们的驱动程序模拟准备好的语句/绑定参数,如果驱动程序支持一种风格而不支持另一种风格,PDO还可以将命名或问号风格的参数标记重写成更合适的东西。
